title: Reasons for watching reality TV in the U.S. 2017 , by age
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 5 groups, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents in Race None of these and 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents in Race I'm invested.
In Race I like the drama, 18-24 had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 10 Races.
Race I like the drama and Other had the biggest gap of 22.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 18-24.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Race None of these, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents 59.0 among the 5 groups and in I'm invested, 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 5 groups, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents in Race None of these and 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents in Race I'm invested.
In Race I like the drama, 18-24 had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 10 Races.
Race I like the drama and Other had the biggest gap of 22.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 18-24.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Race None of these had the maximum Share of respondents among all 5 groups, and it was for 55+. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Race I'm invested for 55+.
Among all the Races, 18-24 had the highest Share of respondents in Race I like the drama and lowest Share of respondents in Race Other.
There is a gap of 22.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 18-24 in Race I like the drama and Other.
Among all 5 groups, 45-54 had the gap of 45.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Race None of these and To connect with likeminded viewers respectively.

In Race None of these, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents 59.0 among the 5 groups and in I'm invested, 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0. The second highest Share of respondents 34.0 was observed for 55+ in Race None of these.

On average, the Race None of these had the highest Share of respondents for all 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. Whereas To connect with likeminded viewers had the lowest average Share of respondents.

data.Race: It helps me forget about real issues in my life/in the world
It helps me stay informed about popular culture
